    • Uses of GradientsAccumulator in org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation that implement GradientsAccumulator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicGradientsAccumulator
      This class provides accumulation for gradients for both input (i.e. updates coming from network) and output (comint from one ore more models training at the same time)
      class  EncodedGradientsAccumulator
      This GradientsAccumulator is suited for CUDA backend.
